pytilities.types._numerictypemeta¶

class pytilities.types._numerictypemeta._NumericTypeMeta¶
__instancecheck__(instance)¶
__subclasscheck__(subclass)¶

Note: returns false for a string as we can’t tell whether it’s numeric. Try to avoid subclass checks of numbers with strings.
